channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee -- McAfee Total Protection (MTP)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee -- McAfee Total Protection (MTP)

item.title: CVE-2020-7298|2024-08-04T09:25:48.965Z -- mcafee -- mcafee%20total%20protection%20%28mtp%29
item.description: Unexpected behavior violation in McAfee Total Protection (MTP) prior to 16.0.R26 allows local users to turn off real time scanning via a specially crafted object making a specific function call.
